title: The Transition Period of a Break-up - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Romance   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Handsome Male Lead   Lovers Reunited   Misunderstandings   Modern Day
author: Cang Wu Bin Bai   苍梧宾白
description:
Three years and five months together, Jiang Kezhou and Ye Zheng broke up.

It only takes a second to say 'break up', but it takes a long time to clear the relationship.

Although they broke up, to the onlookers who don't know the truth, Jiang Kezhou is still the chairman's wife, second sister-in-law, younger sister-in-law, and 'the tigress of the master's house'...

This is particularly embarrassing.>
